drupalNodeEvent.title: The Current Status and Development of the Studies of Taiwan History

field_speakers.processed: Professor Hsueh-chi Hsu (Institute of Taiwan History at Academia Sinica of Taiwan)

field_description.processed: Please join us for a lecture on the studies of Taiwan History by Professor Hsueh-chi Hsu 許雪姬 教授, Director of Institute of Taiwan History at Academia Sinica of Taiwan on March 1st at 3:30-5:15 pm Pacific Time. Prof. Hsu will discuss the trends and changes in the study of Taiwan history, the roles of Institute of Taiwan History of Academia Sinica, the development of local gazetteers, village history, and local studies in Taiwan, and the study of Taiwan’s indigenous people. The lecture will be on Zoom and in Chinese with English subtitles.
